sentences.sentence: Just be sure not to look like that Xiaoxue in ELLE!
sentences.translation: 千万别像ELLE的那个小雪就行了！

sentences.sentence: The actress told Elle UK that is very fond of her ' snaggleteeth .'
sentences.translation: 这位女星告诉英国Elle杂志，她很喜欢自己的“暴牙”。

sentences.sentence: Elle Macpherson has certainly made her mark in the fashion industry.
sentences.translation: 艾尔·麦克弗森给时尚界留下了她自己的重要一笔。
